Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for good price”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel historic center rome 5minute walk pantheon piazza navona campo dei fiori piazza venezia via del corso close food store restaurants hotel staff friendly helpful clean furniture towels linens changed day bathroom terrific modern wifi connection bus stop entrance hotel corner lots taxi cabs

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel, Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: booandkitty
Reviews.Content: girlfriend spent 4 nights hotel november booking travel republic floor overlooking alley left hotel clean tidy size bathroom slight smell occasion noise stay continental breakfast excellent range items hotel it’s location 25min walk vatican 20 min colosseum worst centrally controlled aircon night weather wet humid meant aircon promised wasn’t fortunately rest visit weather dry sunny require aircon overall it’s hotel excellent location visit sights rome flight easyjet fiumicino leonardo da vinci di airport lombardi express train stazione termini takes 20 mins cost 14 euro’s leaving train bear walk 15 mins plat 20 main concourse ticket head towards bus station catch 40 60 40 buy bus ticket board pay 60 euro fine quick fares ticket machine paid 4 euros 1 euro supposed verify ticket machine board bus crowded 247 don’t worry ticket 45 mins verify ticket boarding bus stop return airport directly outside hotel front door arrival stop temple ruins left bookstore bright red signage road sign largo di torre argentina hotel corner opposite eat restaurant door hotel quality reasonably priced journey taverna recommended della torre visitor site excellent food expensive near column victory recommended tour guide food extensive wine list entire restaurant covered bottles floor ceiling located trastevere via piazza ai fori personal favourite food prices waiter located junction via dei fori imperiali via cavour opposite forum taberna et eat drinks restaurant fantastic ceiling located near trevi fountain via del il restaurant café cheapest found rome coffee opposite hotel avoid received excellent service restaurants cafes spoil café upper level colosseum metro stop poor service rude staff expensive fare lastly tours angel tours rome please trip advisor check reviews enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Stop looking! This place is fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: EllenPE
Reviews.Content: hotel della torre argentina 3 stars stayed husband 5 nights july deal mentioned website summer rome special 85 euronight hotel location sandwiched piazza navona campo de fiori center torre argentina transportation hub able walk nearly couldnt walk literally step hotel door catch bus hotel super clean real air conditioning busy street didnt hear sound bathroom huge european standards breakfast pretty lot food selections delicious mention drawback isnt pretty neighborhood youre rome cares definitely highly recommend hotel della torre argentina

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: bluenoseeverton
Reviews.Content: recently spent 4 days beautiful city rome hotel absolutely perfect location enjoy attractions rome offers approximately 5 minutes walk pantheon 10 minutes trevi fountain 15 minutes walk colosseum 20 minutes walk vatican public transport stay whilst rome couple tours highly recommend doing angelo guide perfect host guide beautiful city kept ourselves 9 son thoroughly entertained hotel spotlessly clean continental breakfast adequate offered plenty choice downside especially wife teacoffee facilities nor iron trouser press wouldnt hesitate hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “perfect combination of location, price and quality”
Reviews.Author: WindyCityTravels
Reviews.Content: booking hotel rome looking perfect combination location price quality didn’t pay top dollar 5star rome looking strike balance exact balance hotels online passed cheaper nice hotel elevator narrow easily overpacked bags 4th 5th floor overlooked main road rome quaint feeling minor drawback walking hotel onto busy vittorio emmanuel soon block north south atmosphere rome unique location close pantheon campo de fiori highly easily walkable vatican forum colloseum trevi people extremely helpful assisted dealing air france lost bags hate air france that’s story altogether helpful getting cab rental car restaurant reservations directions taking bus it’s service provided decent size esp cost phenomenal location clean comfy spread bags bathroom surprisingly larger hotels i’ve seen slight drawback sound coming neighbor door below shouting phone tv blaring wasn’t breakfast – didn’t gluttonous spread average courtyard marriott americans accustomed home standard italian breakfast satisfying plus overeat yogurt fruit rolls coffee etc nice job putting spacious comfortable italian hotels breakfast cram stay time rome try main road instead quaint square capture enjoy magical essence rome prove cost quality prohibitive i’ll happily return
